Detailed Description

template<unsigned DerivabilityOrder>
class roboptim::Trajectory< DerivabilityOrder >

Abstract trajectory.

A trajectory is a piecewise smooth mapping from

  • the Cartesian product of a definition interval and a vector space of parameters
  • to a vector space :

    Template Parameters:
    DerivabilityOrderderivability order
